publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3889 Fiona Hyslop: Sale of BB Guns at Marketsâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the decision by the market organisers, Spook, to adopt a new policy that no BB guns or similar articles may be sold at any of their sites in Scotland, following a joint police/trading standards visit to the market at Bonnyrigg and discussions with organisers, and considers this an excellent move given a recent incident when two armed police response units attended a call reported as a man with a handgun, only to find it was a BB gun.
S2M-3889 Sale of BB Guns at Markets (lodged on 27 January 2006) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3889 Sale of BB Guns at Markets (lodged on 27 January 2006) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Rob Gibson*, Bruce Crawford*, Donald Gorrie*, Jim Mather*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-3889 Sale of BB Guns at Markets (lodged on 27 January 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3889 Sale of BB Guns at Markets (lodged on 27 January 2006) Elaine Smith*
